document.full_text: a mauritanian court on tuesday sentenced one man to death and jailed two others for the 2009 murder of an american aid worker, a killing claimed by islamist fighters operating in africa's sahara zones.
document.title: death sentence for mauritania man guilty of u.s. murder
lines_and_colors: a mauritanian court on tuesday sentenced one man to death and jailed two others for the 2009 murder of an american aid worker, a killing claimed by islamist fighters operating in africa's sahara zones.
